pullrequest.title: Add installation guide for OSX from source

content.raw:
Nitpick: I read somewhere and I agree that it's good to keep words like "easy" away from tutorials, so as not to intimidate users. For a person who is not comfortable with a terminal, running the command may not be straightforward, so reading that it should be easy could discourage them.

Just a suggestion, I also use this kind of wording unintentionally sometimes :confused:
